REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Extends the term of existence of the city of Syracuse parking authority by seventeen years
Summary: Extends the term of existence of the city of Syracuse parking authority by seventeen years.
LawCode: Amd ยง1475-c, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to extending the term of existence of the city of Syracuse parking authority
